data.title: List of assets owned by ViacomCBS
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: The following is a list of major assets that are owned by ViacomCBS. Paramount Pictures Paramount Home Media Distribution Paramount Pictures International Paramount Studio Group – physical studio and post production The Studios at Paramount – production facilities & lot Paramount on Location –...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.text:
Parent company: National Amusements

Predecessors: Paramount Communications | Warner-Amex Satellite Entertainment Company | Viacom International | Paramount Famous Lasky Corporation | Famous Players Film Company | Jesse L. Lasky Feature Play Company

Film production

Paramount Pictures (Others) | MTV Films (Other) | Nickelodeon Movies (Others) | Comedy Central Films | VH1 Films | CMT Films | Paramount Animation | Insurge Pictures | Viacom 18 Motion Pictures5 | Paramount Famous Productions | United International Pictures1 | Paramount Pictures France6 | Paramount Players | BET Films

Home Entertainment

Paramount Home Media Distribution | Comedy Central Home Entertainment | Paramount DVD

Television production

Nickelodeon Networks: Nickelodeon (HD) | Nick at Nite | Nicktoons (HD) | Nick Jr. (HD) | TeenNick | NickMusic

Other channel: Aapka Colors5

MTV Extra | MTV Flux | MTV Shows | Viva

India channels5

Hindi entertainment: Colors (HD) | Rishtey | Hindi movies: Rishtey Cineplex (HD) | Hindi music: MTV (HD) and MTV Beats (HD) | English music: VH1 (HD) (English) | Kids: Nickelodeon (HD) | Sonic Nickelodeon | English entertainment: Colors Infinity (HD) | Comedy Central (HD)
